alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 28 at 1:03PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Alabama and Panhandle Florida, including the following counties, in southeast Alabama, Geneva. In Panhandle Florida, Holmes and Walton. * WHEN...Until 315 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1202 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Geneva, De Funiak Springs, Hartford, Slocomb, Samson, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Coffee Springs, Black, Royals Crossroads, Leonia, Sweetgum Head, Darlington and Barker Store. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
